jobDescription: Join us in an exciting adventure as we open our second location in Metro Detroit. Joe Muer Seafood has rich traditions of exceptional food and impeccable service, and we are proud to hire the very best in the industry.Fine Dining ServerIdeal candidate will have a minimum of two years of fine dining experience. In addition, will have exceptional customer service and interpersonal communication skills.Upon completion of our 10 day training program applicants shall have:Full knowledge of menu/bar/wine.Describing items on the menu including ingredients used along with how it is prepared, cooked and, served.Clearly explain chef specials and answer questions.Exceptional customer service.The ability to suggestively sell and recommend wine pairings.Anticipate guests needs.Communicate with guests to ensure satisfaction and resolve complaints.Provide guests with happy hour specials, and upcoming promotions.Provide checks and collect payment from guests.Enforce rules and regulations in regard to alcohol consumption/purchase.Be a team player and a part of our family.Additional RequirementsA minimum of two years fine dining experience is required.We offer tremendous growth and earning potential with an establishment with proven track record and built in fan base in Metro Detroit.Looking for hard working, dedicated and, charismatic service people with a desire to excel.We love to promote from within and take care of our family of employees. We have a passion for our jobs and value the people who work for us!
